DESCRIPTION: Similar to real life slot machines. You need a certain amount of symbols to get a certain amount of payouts.
tableDescription:
**Only the highest will be paid.**
**The symbols can be anywhere. Doesn't have to be inline.**
slotBottom:
You won: **{{cLogo}}{{totalwon}}**
Your bet: **{{cLogo}}{{amount}}**
Profit: **{{cLogo}}{{profit}}**

Type `{{cmd}} table [page]` to see the table payouts
bonusDescription: The spinner will stop in **{{time}} seconds**.
bonusEnd: You've won **{{cLogo}}{{won}}** from your bonus spin!
